UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile, including their plan and usage.

userId.description: The unique identifier for the user, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

messageCount.description: The number of messages the user has generated.

SalesTag.title: SalesTag
SalesTag.description: Represents a predefined sales tag used for generating sales messages.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SalesTag entity.

name.description: The name of the sales tag (e.g., 'Greeting', 'Objection').

description.description: A description of the sales tag, explaining its purpose.

exampleMessage.description: An example of a sales message that can be generated using this tag.

ChatMessage.title: ChatMessage
ChatMessage.description: Represents a chat message within the VendaZap AI application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ChatMessage entity.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the message was created.

userInput.description: The raw user input in the chat.

generatedMessage.description: The AI-generated sales message based on user input and selected tag.

niche.description: The niche specified by the user for the sales message.
